name: react-matterkit
description: React GUI component kit based on matterkit.io design and focusing on input fields.

scripts.prebuild: rm -rf lib && rm -rf browser && mkdir browser
scripts.build:browser: browserify lib/index.js --standalone matterkit --debug | exorcist browser/matterkit.js.map > browser/matterkit.js
scripts.build: npm run build:lib && npm run build:browser

author: Polgár András
